text: Gheorghe Ceaușilă (born 11 October 1966) is a retired Romanian striker.Weltfussball ==Honours== ;Steaua București *Liga I: 1985–86 ;Universitatea Craiova *Liga I: 1990–91 *Cupa României: 1990–91 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:Super League Greece players Category:Israeli Premier League players Category:Chimia Râmnicu Vâlcea players Category:FC Steaua București players Category:FC Olt Scornicești players Category:ACS Dacia Unirea Brăila players Category:FC Sportul Studențesc București players Category:PAOK FC players Category:FC Dinamo București players Category:FC Progresul București players Category:FC Farul Constanța players Category:Hapoel Tayibe F.C. players Category:FC Unirea Alba Iulia players Category:ASC Daco-Getica București players Category:Association football forwards Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Israel Category:Romania international footballers
title: Gheorghe Ceaușilă
